attributes.action: Urge everyone to get behind Simon Hemmingfields' campaign to be The Richest Beggar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simon Hemmingfield is on a quest to become the richest beggar in the world simply by asking for the money see the website by searching for the richest beggar at google  
or Yahoo, giving the money to charities and good causes because as we known not all good causes are charities.
